page.title: 08WORK SURVEY
page.content: 10:A LARGE NUMBER OF EMPLOYEES DO NOT HAVE A REPETITIVE OCCUPATION. 11:PROMOTION IS A POSSIBILITY FOR ALL WORKERS 12:50% OF WORKERS ARE IN JOBS AIMED FOR UPON LEAVING SCHOOL 13:THE MAJORITY WORK IN A TRADITIONAL COMPANY 14:50% WORK WITHIN A LARGE WORKFORCE WHILE 50% WORK WITHIN A SMALLER WORKFORCE 15:50% HAVE WORKED LONG-TERM WITH A COMPANY;50% HAVE WORKED SHORT-TERM 16:THE MAJORITY WERE NOT REQUIRED TO MOVE TO GLENROTHES. 17:MAXIMUM TRAVEL DISTANCE TO WORK IS 15 MILES. 18:THE MAJORITY ARE HAPPY WITH WORK;THOSE WHO ARE NOT LACK STIMULATION.
